fist

[fIst; fist]

可数名词

~ law

shake [clench] one's ~ (angrily)
(愤怒地) 挥拳 [握紧拳头]

a. 手
Give us your ~.
伸出你的手吧,让我们握握手

the [an] iron fist in the [a] velvet glove = the [an] iron HAND in the [a] velvet glove
